1601784000.title: BBC World News
1601784000.descr: The latest news, bought to you by the BBC, 24-hours a day. All the latest updates from the world of politics, business, education, health, sports and the arts, both nationally and internationally.

1601789400.title: In Business Africa
1601789400.descr: In Business Africa is a BBC weekly news program, hosted by Nancy Kacungira in Lagos, Nigeria and Lerato Mbele in Johannesburg, South Africa. 1601811000.descr: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and trade union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines.
